  2. Midjourney introduces first new image generation model in over a year  Ars Technica
  3. Try Midjourney’s V7 AI Image Generator, Then Share Feedback & Show Off Your Creations  TechRepublic
  4. Midjourney v7 launches with voice prompting and faster draft mode — why is it getting mixed reviews?  VentureBeat
  5. Midjourney Should Now be Scaring Photographers  The Phoblographer

item.title: Amazon’s new AI agent will shop third-party sites for you - TechCrunch
item.description:
1. Amazon’s new AI agent will shop third-party sites for you  TechCrunch
  2. Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites  AboutAmazon.com
  3. Amazon can now buy products from other websites for you  The Verge
  4. Amazon pilots AI app feature that can buy items from third-party sites  Yahoo Finance
  5. Shelly Palmer - NotebookLM's 'Discover Sources,' Amazon's 'Buy for Me'  SaskToday.ca
